org.vertx.java.core.http

Class HttpClientResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vertx.java.core.http.impl.HttpReadStreamBase
      • org.vertx.java.core.http.HttpClientResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadStream

    public abstract class HttpClientResponse
extends org.vertx.java.core.http.impl.HttpReadStreamBase
    Represents a client-side HTTP response.

    An instance of this class is provided to the user via a Handler instance that was specified when one of the HTTP method operations, or the generic HttpClient.request(String, String, org.vertx.java.core.Handler) method was called on an instance of HttpClient.

    It implements ReadStream so it can be used with Pump to pump data with flow control.

    Instances of this class are not thread-safe

    Author:
    Tim Fox
